masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "The glitter bearcat is using our Ferris wheel as an escape route! She's swinging from cart to cart like it's a circus act—because apparently IT WAS. She's heading for the roller coaster rails. This is the weirdest chase I've ever radioed in."
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Pursue Barbara through the carnival rides
  • Don't let her reach the exit—or the rooftops
  • Keep carnival guests safe during the aerial chase
